wikipedia_page.main: John Alexander Lambie (18 December 1868 – 25 December 1923) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward in the 1880s and 1890s. He still holds the records as the youngest Scotland player and captain of all time.

response: * 18 December – John Lambie (d. 1923), Scotland international in three matches (1886–1888).
